item.description:
NEWS ALERT: The Dinner Speaker Event IS CANCELLED TOMORROW, TUESDAY, FEBRUARY 16 DUE TO SNOW City of Waltham declares Snow Emergency. Please email betsy@optimumhealthsolution. org if you have bought a ticket on-line to instruct as to your preference of the following:

* donate the money to Optimum Health Solution - Kids
* apply the money for a ticket to Brenda Cobb March Dinner Speaker event
* ask for a refund
* other

Space is still available for Thursday, Feb 18 discounted Health Assessments

Optimum Health Solution is a Non-Profit dedicated to eliminating obesity, chronic disease and mal-nutrition, especially in children, through the education and advocacy of healthful living. Donations Welcome
www.OptimumHealthSolution.org/donate.htm
______________________________________

February 16th Dinner Speaker features "Personal Adventures in Healing"

Don't miss this exciting event where a panel of Raw Foodists share their personal triumphs in overcoming debilitating health challenges. Randy Jacobs, owner of Life Force Growers-distributor of wheat grass and sprouts, will be moderating our distinguished panel. Bring your questions and share your healing.

Our guests include:

Wayne Silva, featured in Hippocrates Magazine, overcame Diabetes 2, morbid obesity(430 lbs to 170 1lbs) high blood pressure and colon/prostate cancer.

Dorothy Torrey- Acid/alkaline Health Coach on Cape Cod recovering from Suicidal Depression, severe osteo-arthritis and a breast cancer diagnosis.

Tom Lindsley with his children -Jane & Ray -Successful business man of 25 years and Health Consultant using detoxification techniques and raw food to overcome challenges with super hypersensitivities and allergies to all chemicals.

Sharon Kane - Fermentation Instructor overcame intestinal dysbiosis that manifested as candida, chronic sinus infections, bronchitis, asthma and fatigue syndrome.

Betsy Bragg - Executive Director of Optimum Health Solution challenged with crippling arthritis from multiple injuries, ADHD and compulsive overeating and drinking.

Come early to learn how to make delicious warm, seaweed Soup. Susan Allison www.thoreaufoods.com - chef & wellness coach . Susan will be preparing and presenting warm seaweed soup. Suan harvests seaweed on the coast.

When: Tuesday, February 16, 5:30 - 9 pm

Where: U MA Waltham Center, 240 Beaver St., Waltham, MA see www.optimumhealthsolution.org/directions.htm

What to bring and pay:

Bring your family and friends. Children under 18 are free admission - just bring a dish of food as their contribution.

Save $5 by buying here: www.optimumhealthsolution.org/blog

Or pay $20 at the door.

Bring raw organic, unprocessed, ready to serve dish for 8 with labeled utensils or pay an extra $10. You can pay at the door or pay online here: www.optimumhealthsolution.org/blog

Posted by www.essenic.com
item.name: OHS Potluck / Speaker: "Personal Adventures in Healing" *CANCELLED DUE TO SNOW*
